forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 54. West wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 37. East wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow showers before 8am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 70. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
